tool_description: Dummy rest API about dogs perfect for beginners learning APIs
name: DogDummyAPI
title: DogDummyAPI

api_list.name: Filter dogs
Get single image
api_list.description: returns the image of Border Collies dog
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dogdummyapi.p.rapidapi.com/image/Border_Collies.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dogdummyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://dogdummyapi.p.rapidapi.com/image/Border_Collies.jpg"

api_list.name: Get all dogs from category

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get single dog by name
api_list.description: return single id with the specific name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dogdummyapi.p.rapidapi.com/dog/name/Chihuahua"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dogdummyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Limits dogs result
Search dogs by color
api_list.description: Return all dogs that include the color query value

api_list.name: Search dogs by name
api_list.description: Return all dogs that name includes the search query value in this case the "am"
